meanings.definition: A person in charge of commercial transactions on a ship.
meanings.sent1: The supercargoes oversaw the loading and unloading of goods on the ship.
meanings.sent2: The supercargoes were responsible for managing the business aspects of the ship's journey.
meanings.sent3: The supercargoes tried to haggle with the suppliers for better prices on the goods.
meanings.sent4: In the world of the ship, the supercargoes were the masters of trade and negotiation.
meanings.sent5: The supercargoes' role was crucial in ensuring the success of the voyage.
